Description: Re-implementation of Caesar III with changes to gameplay Augustus is a fully working open-source version of Caesar III, with enhanced, customizable gameplay to Caesar III using project Julius UI enhancements. Gameplay enhancements include: . - Roadblocks - Market special orders - Global labour pool - Partial warehouse storage - Increased game limits - Zoom controls - And more! . Because of gameplay changes and additions, save files from Augustus are NOT compatible with Caesar III or Julius. Augustus is able to load Caesar 3 save files, but not the other way around. If you want vanilla experience with only visual and UI improvements, or want to use save files in base Caesar III, check Julius. . Augustus requires the original assets (graphics, sounds, etc) from Caesar III to run. It optionally supports the high-quality MP3 files once provided on the Sierra website.
Package-List: augustus-game deb contrib/games optional arch=any augustus-game-data deb contrib/games optional arch=all
